english.segment1: Did you really think. That we could make it make sense. Did you really think. We could let it happen all over again. This is what you got. When you tried the first time. This is what we got. When we listened with our eyes
english.segment2: We're moving on. Moving on. We can't stay. No we can't stay
english.segment3: And there is no way. This could ever make sense. And there is no way. I could let this happen again. This is what we got. The first time that we tried. This is what you get every time
english.segment4: We're moving on. Moving on. We can't stay. No we can't stay
